sentences.en: Alan narrowly avoided an accident.
sentences.cn: 艾伦险出事故。

sentences.en: Avoid deposits in excess of £20,000 in any one account.
sentences.cn: 单一账户存款勿超过两万英镑。

sentences.en: Avoid muscle strain by warming up with slow jogging.
sentences.cn: 先慢跑热热身，免得拉伤肌肉。

sentences.en: Avoid trips to the country while the pollen count is high.
sentences.cn: 花粉计数高时，尽量避免去乡村旅行。

sentences.en: Billy Bonds has never been one to avoid a scrap.
sentences.cn: 比利·邦兹经常与球员发生拳脚冲突。

sentences.en: Do avoid potentially contentious subjects such as religion, sex or politics.
sentences.cn: 一定要避免可能引起争议的话题，如宗教、性和政治。

sentences.en: Efforts are under way to avoid a £800,000 overspend.
sentences.cn: 正在采取措施以避免出现80万英镑的超支。

sentences.en: Everyone seemed to be avoiding Nick.
sentences.cn: 似乎所有人都在躲着尼克。

sentences.en: He fled to Costa Rica to avoid military service.
sentences.cn: 他逃到了哥斯达黎加以逃避服兵役。

sentences.en: He heard tires squeal as the car braked to avoid a collision.
sentences.cn: 为避免相撞而刹车时，他听到了轮胎与地面刺耳的摩擦声。

sentences.en: I avoid working in places which are too public.
sentences.cn: 我避免在过于抛头露面的地方工作。

sentences.en: I tried to adopt a curled-up position to avoid damaging my limbs.
sentences.cn: 我努力保持蜷曲的姿势以免四肢受伤。

sentences.en: It is important to take measures to avoid the risk of fire.
sentences.cn: 采取措施避免火灾风险很重要。

sentences.en: Pregnant women should avoid certain foods such as raw eggs.
sentences.cn: 孕妇应当戒吃生鸡蛋之类的食物。

sentences.en: Road safety is taught to young children to avoid road accidents.
sentences.cn: 小孩子受到道路安全知识的教育，以避免交通事故。

sentences.en: Saunas can be hazardous if misused. Avoid a big meal beforehand.
sentences.cn: 洗桑拿浴如果方法不当会有危险，浴前切忌饱食。

sentences.en: She carefully avoided his eyes (=  did not look directly at his face  ) .
sentences.cn: 她小心地避开他的目光。

sentences.en: She carefully avoided his eyes (= did not look directly at his face ) . ＃
sentences.cn: 她小心地避开他的目光。

sentences.en: The couple married in the Caribbean to avoid a media circus.
sentences.cn: 为了摆脱媒体的关注，这对新人在加勒比喜结连理。

sentences.en: The police say he swallowed a cyanide capsule to avoid arrest.
sentences.cn: 警察说他为了逃避逮捕就吞了一颗氰化物胶囊。

sentences.en: Use different colours of felt pen on your sketch to avoid confusion.
sentences.cn: 用不同颜色的毡头笔画草图，以免搞混。

sentences.en: Why did you speak to him? You usually avoid him like the plague (=  try hard to avoid him  ) .
sentences.cn: 你怎么同他说话了？你平时像躲瘟神一样躲着他的。

sentences.en: Women have to dress modestly, to avoid being harassed by the locals.
sentences.cn: 女士穿着应当庄重，以免受到当地人的骚扰。

words.tran_cn: 可避免的；可作为无效的；可回避的

trans.tran_en: to prevent something bad from happening

trans.tran_cn: 避开， 避免； 撤销； 防止
trans.tran_en: to prevent something bad from happening
